definition: ordinary/commonplace/mundane/temporal/of the material world (as opposed to supernatural or immortal levels)/every/all/whatever/altogether/gist/outline/note of Chinese musical scale

sentences.english: When he asked questions, the answers came back in Wall Street gobbledygook.
sentences.chinese: 他但凡提出疑问，得到的回答全是华尔街的官样文章。

sentences.english: Wherever possible, recommendations build on and strengthen existing mechanisms and capacities.
sentences.chinese: 但凡可能，便通过建议来巩固和加强现有机制与能力。

sentences.english: Anyone who wants to pass here must show his ID card.
sentences.chinese: 但凡想从这里通过哒人必需出示证件。

definition: to be bound to/to be sure to
most likely/mostly (in 8 or 9 cases out of 10)/vast majority
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
generally speaking/by and large/for the most part
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
only/just (i.e. it is only that...)/all except/unique
